About.title: About
About.aboutText1: This website was created with Next.js, Material UI, and SCSS. I chose these technologies because I enjoy working with them.
About.aboutText2: The website also uses some external API calls to Last.fm, Steam, and Runescape to display some fun data. These API calls were added more as a playful addition than for any other reason. They make it more personal and it also fun challenge to display and look through the results of an api call.
About.aboutText3: This project has been a lot of fun to create. It's been a great opportunity to learn and experiment with Next.js, Material UI, and SCSS. I've enjoyed every step of the process, from designing the website to implementing the features.
